wiki.content: The A Team Songfacts explains the song is a true story and was written by Sheeran after meeting a homeless prostitute called Angel, whilst volunteering at a Crisis homeless shelter. The song became the highest selling debut single on the UK singles charts in the first half of 2011. 'The A Team' was the debut single release from twenty-year-old singer/songwriter Ed Sheeran and is a story about a girl he met whilst volunteering at a homeless shelter – it soared into the top three on its release in June 2011. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

track.name: The A Team
comments: His voice is so soothing. What a sweet song ♥
Took me a really long time to warm up to this song and even Ed Sheeran in general, but now I can really appreciate it. Very nice.
the song that introduced me to the godsend that is ed sheeran. <333 [2]
closed eyes, hoping for a better life
I love this song. I love Ed
Love this song. This song and Drunk are the only two songs I would ever listen to I guess.
Watching the video for this has legit  made me cry,  really great song.
Amazing, bittersweet song. I'm amazed at how well written the lyrics are. ♫ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♫
